title: One model for Gramsci, which might appear surprising, was the fictional character Father Brown, who put himself into the mind of the perpetrator of a crime and looked for the evidence which did not fit immediate preconceptions. that civil society should not be extended to informal social or economic networks in the pre-Gorbachev Soviet Union.
